topic.title: How to Factory Reset Univois Phones
topic.shortdesc: Before you start to provision Univois phones with , you need to reset Univois phones to factory default settings. Otherwise, Auto Provision may fail because of the previous configurations on the phone.

body.p: This guide takes Univois U6S running firmware V0.0.0.25.0123_Alpha(1) as an example.

ol.li:
Find the phone IP address.
Navigate to Menu View Status on the phone.

Log in the phone web interface with your username and password.
username: admin
password: admin
Go to Maintenance Default Settings , click Reset to Factory Settings.

Click Yes to reset the phone.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
